item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
<script src="//localhost:1313/instructies/p5.js-art/p5.js-widget-gh-pages/p5-widget.js"></script>
<script type="text/p5">
function setup() {
 createCanvas(100, 100);
}

function draw() {
 background(255, 0, 200);
}
</script>
</body>
</html>
